histogram.name: PluginVm.DlcUseResult
histogram.summary: Recorded at each time PluginVM DLC is installed.

histogram.name: PluginVm.EngagementTime.Background
histogram.summary: Times when user is engaged and Plugin VM apps are running in the background, but the user isn't focusing on an Plugin VM app window. See PluginVm.EngagementTime.Total for further details.

histogram.name: PluginVm.EngagementTime.Foreground
histogram.summary: Times when user is engaged and focuses on a Plugin VM window. See PluginVm.EngagementTime.Total for further details.

histogram.name: PluginVm.EngagementTime.PluginVmTotal
histogram.summary: Total of PluginVm.EngagementTime.Background and .Foreground, which is the time the user is engaged and Plugin VM is running either in the foreground or background. See PluginVm.EngagementTime.Total for further details.

histogram.name: PluginVm.EngagementTime.Total
histogram.summary: Total CrOS user session time (from login to logout) excluding times when user "disengages": screen is locked or dims down due to user idle. Engagement time metrics, along with foreground and background time, are only collected on users with Plugin VM enabled. All four metrics are accumulated and recorded to UMA once a day. For Total Plugin VM engagement time, see PluginVm.EngagementTime.PluginVmTotal.

histogram.name: PluginVm.Image.DownloadedSize
histogram.summary: The size of the PluginVm image downloaded in MB. Recorded each time PluginVm image is sucessfully downloaded.

histogram.name: PluginVm.LaunchResult
histogram.summary: Recorded at each attempt to launch PluginVm, recording whether this attempt is successful or not.

histogram.name: PluginVm.SetupFailureReason
histogram.summary: Recorded when the Plugin VM installer fails.

histogram.name: PluginVm.SetupResult
histogram.summary: Recorded at each attempt to set up PluginVm, recording the setup result. As of M83, errors are grouped together here and broken down in PluginVm.SetupFailureReason.

histogram.name: PluginVm.SetupTime
histogram.summary: Recorded at each successful attempt to set up PluginVm, recording the time that user spent waiting for setup to be finished. When error occurs during setup and user clicks retry button - time between pressing retry button and setup being finished is recorded.
